entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who scooped up Hermione's remaining possessions and followed her.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the main character in this passage. She is described as being upset.

entities.name: luna lovegood
entities.description: Luna Lovegood is mentioned as accompanying Hermione from the girls' bathroom.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as greeting Luna and offering to help Hermione with her belongings.

entities.name: moan
entities.description: Moan is likely a nickname for someone, possibly Moaning Myrtle.

relationships.description: Harry helped Hermione by holding out her books and offering to comfort her.
Luna Lovegood accompanied Hermione from the girls' bathroom.
